Description.SourceString: Heroes can be leveled up with Hero XP. Collect Hero XP during gameplay then go to the Heroes menu to upgrade their level. Hero level is crucial to success, and is the first thing you should try to improve.
Description.LocalizedString: Heroes can be leveled up with Hero XP. Collect Hero XP during gameplay then go to the Heroes menu to upgrade their level. Hero level is crucial to success, and is the first thing you should try to improve.
